item.title: Subtle
item.description: After working through a book or two I decided I needed to step aside and work on a project of my own. This would let me take what I’d learned and put it to work on something different, without training wheels. The question was what to work on. Should I build a Twitterâ„¢ clone with in 15 minutes?

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Dan Anderson, a software developer living near Nashville with my wife and son. I enjoy solving puzzles, woodworking, and anything near the water. Currently, I’m learning Elixir and its libraries with a goal of joining an amazing team to build software that matters. The deeper I get the more I enjoy this ecosystem.
